response.skills: Aspen Plus, Aspen HYSYS, LaTeX, Rhinoceros, Matlab, Microsoft Office, AutoCAD, Visual Basic, Project Engineering, Python (Programming Language), Mathcad, Problem Solving, Microsoft Excel, C++, Chemical Process Engineering, Research, Critical Thinking, Team Leadership, Independent Thinking

profile_positions.description: Plan, organize, and deliver chemical engineering education in a didactic laboratory and/or classroom setting to promote student success.
profile_positions.title: Visiting Lecturer

profile_positions.description:
• Conduct extensive research on the production of tetrahydrofuran from 1,4-anhydroerythritol, a product obtained from biomass through hydrodeoxygenation (HDO) over a bimetallic heterogeneous catalyst with high yields (>98%).
• Design, operation, and maintenance of plug flow and batch reactors with/without inline reaction monitoring.
• Characterization of bimetallic catalysts using XRD, XPS, TGA, TPR, DRIFT, and FTIR.
• Mentoring undergraduate students from UPRM in our research laboratory.
• Participation in REU and RET programs as a mentor to encouraging undergraduate students to pursue STEM careers and developing interactive scientific demonstrations to explain phenomena chemicals.
• Advised and managed team members on initiation and execution of laboratory experiments and equipment.
• Building operational and maintenance manuals for laboratory equipment.
• Quantify reaction products with the use of HPLC and GC equipment.
• Work with a team of researchers to implement and achieve project goals.
• Exceptional problem-solving ability and analytic skill to solve issues efficiently.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Student Research Assistant

profile_positions.description:
• Understand the fundamental aspects of the methane activation on modified zeolites through density
functional theory (DFT) calculations to facilitate methane transformation, a potent global warming gas, to
high value-added chemicals.
• Evaluate different coordination environments of metals in framework zeolites for methane activation.
• Synthesized and characterization of modified-zeolites using XRD.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Student Research Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Desarrollo de reacciones a nivel laboratorio y planta piloto; 
Evaluación del producto final a través de pruebas físico-químicas.
profile_positions.title: Practicante de Investigación y desarrollo
